name: Resistance Bands
description: Set of multi-resistance latex bands ideal for muscle rehabilitation and strength training.

name: Resistance Pulley Bands
description: Pole-mounted pulley resistance bands for upper body rehabilitation and strengthening.

name: Resistance Bands And Dumbbells
description: Combo set including 4 resistance bands and two 3lb dumbbells for total body rehab.

name: Basic PT Kit
description: All-in-one physical therapy kit with resistance bands, dumbbells, and a massage ball.

name: Kettlebell Set (4, 6, 8kg/8.8, 13.2, 17.6lbs)
description: Durable neoprene-coated kettlebells for progressive strength and rehab training.

name: Pair of 2kg (4.4lbs) Dumbbells
description: Lightweight dumbbells perfect for recovery and gradual strength progression.

name: Pair of 3.2kg (7lbs) Dumbbells
description: Mid-weight dumbbells ideal for building strength post-injury.

name: Pair of 1.4kg (3lbs) Dumbbells
description: Ergonomic dumbbells designed for light rehab exercises and joint-friendly training.

name: Massage Gun
description: Portable massage gun with 4 heads for deep tissue recovery and muscle relaxation.

name: Unicorn Sleep Mask
description: Soft, whimsical sleep mask designed to improve rest and recovery.

name: Gray Sleep Mask
description: Contoured blackout sleep mask to enhance rest and recovery.

name: Velcro Wrist Brace
description: Adjustable wrist brace with breathable fabric for support and injury prevention.

name: Adhesive Athletic Tape Strips
description: Pre-cut adhesive strips for muscle and joint support during activity.

name: Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip yoga mat for stretching, mobility, and range of motion rehab.

name: Foam Roller
description: Firm foam roller for muscle release and injury prevention warm-ups.

name: Hand Foam Roller
description: Compact hand roller for localized muscle release and warm-up routines.

name: Elbow Compression Sleeve
description: Compression sleeve for elbows. Ambidextrous design for support and injury prevention.

name: Mouthguard
description: A plastic mouthguard for teeth protection during sports and physical activity.

name: Reusable Ice Pack
description: A reusable gel ice pack for cold therapy to reduce inflammation and aid recovery.

name: Water Bottle
description: A BPA-free water bottle to stay hydrated during workouts and recovery.

name: Balance Disc
description: Inflatable balance disc for stability exercises and joint rehab.

name: Digital Goniometer
description: Digital angle measurement tool for tracking joint range improvements during rehab.
